evidence.text: Navient Multi-State Settlement, 39 State Attorneys General Announce $1.85 Billion Settlement With Student Loan Servicer Navient (August 17, 2023), available at https://www.navientagsettlement.com/Home/portalid/0. The multistate coalition obtained $1.85 billion in student debt relief and consumer restitution.
